properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 2:21AM EST until January 7 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches.

* WHERE...Fluvanna and Western Louisa Counties.

* WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 5 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Snow or slush covered road conditions and reduced
visibilities are expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations up to 3 inches are
possible over far western portions of Louisa and Fluvanna
counties.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please
call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go
to http://DriveNC.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
